results.example: "It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data. Insensibly one begins to twist facts to suit theories, instead of theories to suit facts. But in this case I had a theory, and I will tell you what it is, for between you and me, Watson, there is nothing remarkable about this case, except the fact that it has not been remarked upon, and that is why I have been able to deceive even the redoubtable Lestrade, by making him believe that the case was more complex than it actually is, and now, with this disguise, I shall be able to go wherever I please, and hear whatever I please, without being recognized." -
